title: Heading for Confrontation
itunes:title: Heading for Confrontation
description:
Anne-Marie Trevelyan, Secretary of State for International Trade, discusses her talks with the US Trade Representative Katherine Tai. But MP Drew Hendry, the SNP's Trade spokesperson, says no amount of trade deals 'touch the sides' for the damage caused by the botched Brexit deal.

Edward Lucas, senior fellow at CEPA tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Europe will take the economic pain of Russia cutting gas supplies as it's determined to support Ukraine. - but that we are heading eventually for a confrontation with Russia. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Anne-Marie Trevelyan, Secretary of State for International Trade, discusses her talks with the US Trade Representative Katherine Tai. But MP Drew Hendry, the SNP's Trade spokesperson, says no amount of trade deals 'touch the sides' for the damage caused by the botched Brexit deal.

Edward Lucas, senior fellow at CEPA tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Europe will take the economic pain of Russia cutting gas supplies as it's determined to support Ukraine. - but that we are heading eventually for a confrontation with Russia. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
